data.comment: Charleroi kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Charleroi take a 0-1 lead thanks to Mamadou Fall.
In the minute 43, Goal! Duckens Nazon equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. St. Truidense kick-off.
In the minute 49, Samuel Asamoah (St. Truidense) gets a yellow card.
Shamar Nicholson is on target to give Charleroi a 1-2 advantage.
The home team have replaced Ibrahima Sory Sankhon with Seung-Woo Lee. This is the first substitution made today by Stefaan Van Winckel.
In the minute 67, Ken Nkuba is on a sub for Saido Berahino for Charleroi.
He's off! Samuel Asamoah is shown a second yellow card.
Ali Gholizadeh (Charleroi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 75, Jules Van Cleemput (Charleroi) has received a yellow card from Bram Van Driessche.
Stefaan Van Winckel is making the team's second substitution at Staaien with Oleksandr Filippov replacing Yuma Suzuki.
Stefaan Van Winckel (St. Truidense) is making a third substitution, with Keito Nakamura replacing Facundo Colidio.
In the minute 81, Amine Benchaib is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for Charleroi at Staaien.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
